Received: from JP3884@... by imo-d06.mx.aol.com (mail_out_v27.12.) id a.44.67ca0fd (4442) for <nbwrpg@egroups.com>; Fri, 18 Aug 2000 16:13:33 -0400 (EDT)
Message-ID: <44.67ca0fd.26cef2ed@...>

Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: AOL 5.0 for Windows sub 41
From: JP3884@...

    Black Aracnia finally got a moment to nap. Deep, in a restful sluber, she 
dreamed. There she stood in front of Tarantulas' lair. The original aracnid 
that made Megatron so angry. She went deeper and deeper into the cavern and 
then saw him. He was in his transmetal form and looking over a few papers.
    She turned to run away but was caught in a web. She turned and saw the 
face of Tarantulas right in front of her giving her a rashy laugh.
    "Witch! Did you think I was actually gone? Our mental link imprisoned me 
into your subconscience while my clone was masquerading. Now that I have you 
in my little web...I will be restoring my body."
    "Your a psyco! My troops will find out!" She screamed.
    "I think not. Im quite a good mimmick. Now rest. I will do the thinking 
from now on."
    As he said that Aracnia felt herself slip away, and he body woke in the 
control of Tarantulas.
